name: Paracetamol 500mg
description: Effective pain relief and fever reducer. Safe for adults and children when used as directed.

name: Amoxicillin 250mg
description: Broad-spectrum antibiotic for bacterial infections. Prescription required for safety.

name: Ibuprofen 400mg
description: Anti-inflammatory pain reliever. Effective for headaches, muscle pain, and joint pain.

name: Omeprazole 20mg
description: Proton pump inhibitor for acid reflux and ulcers. Requires medical supervision.

name: Cetirizine 10mg
description: 24-hour allergy relief for seasonal allergies, hay fever, and hives.

name: Metformin 500mg
description: First-line treatment for type 2 diabetes. Helps control blood sugar levels.

name: Vitamin D3 1000 IU
description: Essential vitamin for bone health and immune system support.

name: Losartan 50mg
description: ACE inhibitor for high blood pressure and heart protection. Prescription required.

name: Fluticasone Nasal Spray
description: Corticosteroid nasal spray for allergic rhinitis and nasal congestion.

name: Dextromethorphan Syrup
description: Effective cough suppressant for dry, non-productive coughs.
